snippet.title: Outmode Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Play the demo on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1860700/Outmode/

Outmode is a brand new Synthwave/Outrun based arcade racing game brought to you by Rockateer. Encompassing all things Synthwave, this game will bring the heat of a retro-futuristic '80s straight to your PC with a diverse palette of cars, characters and game modes.

Key Features:
- A cast of '80s style "Hero" cars/characters, each with their own unique abilities and driving stats to knock out the competition.
- Heavy use of the Outrun aesthetic and music, both in a traditional and modern style.
- Five different pulse racing or "chill out to" game modes.
- Arcade driving model with drifting, boosting and manual gear shifting.
- The choice between an immersive first person mode with no HUD or the classic third person chase camera.

Keep up to date with Outmode news:
Discord Server - https://discord.gg/X2KaN7E8pH
Twitter - https://twitter.com/OutmodeGame
Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/outmodegame/
YouTube - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCAG6OeiwiN9y7-18f1aMVkQ

'Turbo Squad'🎵 provided by the talented and generous Bestrack:
https://www.flowcode.com/page/bestrack

Stay rad.
